name: Spiderlegs
description: Sometimes 2 legs isn't enough. Sometimes 4 legs isn't enough. Spiderlegs has you covered...in legs. This LoRA jams in legs and is best run in batches for the initial generation. I find a LoRA weight of 1-1.3, combined with ((spdlgs, extra legs):1.4) and squatting/sitting works well for txt2img. With img2img you can tone the LoRA down to 0.5ish. It's been trained on the tag spdlgs since the word spider gets you spooderman in a lot of models.

meta.prompt:
(ultra realistic, highly detailed:1.4), best quality, masterpiece
dark forest, girl, spiderwebs, squatting
((big breasts):0.75)
<lora:spiderlegs:0.5> ((spdlgs, extra legs):1),
arachne, attached at the hip
meta.negativePrompt: easynegative, bad-hands-5, (low quality, worst quality:1.3), ((nude, naked))
